member.name: T:AD.Collections.FlattenExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to flatten enumerables into one-dimensional arrays.

member.name: M:AD.Collections.FlattenExtensions.Flatten``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Converts an enumerable of enumerables into a one-dimensional array (e.g. T[]).
member.typeparam: The type of the inner elements and the resulting one-dimensional array.
member.param: An enumerable of enumerables to flatten.

member.name: T:AD.Collections.ToJaggedArrayExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to convert enumerables into jagged arrays.

member.name: M:AD.Collections.ToJaggedArrayExtensions.ToJaggedArray``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Converts an enumerable of enumerables of type T into a two-dimensional jagged array (e.g. T[][]).
member.typeparam: The type of the inner elements and the resulting jagged array.
member.param: An enumerable of enumerables to convert into a jagged array.
member.returns: A jagged array of type T[][].

member.name: M:AD.Collections.ToJaggedArrayExtensions.ToJaggedArray``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}})
member.summary: Converts an enumerable of enumerables of type T into a two-dimensional jagged array (e.g. T[][]).
member.typeparam: The type of the inner elements and the resulting jagged array.
member.param: An enumerable of enumerables to convert into a jagged array.
member.returns: A jagged array of type T[][].

member.name: M:AD.Collections.ToJaggedArrayExtensions.ToJaggedArray``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}}})
member.summary: Converts an enumerable of enumerables of type T into a three-dimensional jagged array (e.g. T[][][]).
member.typeparam: The type of the inner elements and the resulting jagged array.
member.param: An enumerable of enumerables of enumerables to convert into a jagged array.
member.returns: A jagged array of type T[][][].

member.name: M:AD.Collections.ToJaggedArrayExtensions.ToJaggedArray``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}}}})
member.summary: Converts an enumerable of enumerables of type T into a four-dimensional jagged array (e.g. T[][][][]).
member.typeparam: The type of the inner elements and the resulting jagged array.
member.param: An enumerable of enumerables of enumerables of enumerables to convert into a jagged array.
member.returns: A jagged array of type T[][][][].
